image.title: Cloud Native & Open Source: A Team Lead’s Working Journal

item.title: CyberArk Conjur 13 has been released.
item.description:
During the previous days, CyberArk has released version 13.0 of Conjur Enterprise.
What’s new? Who should consider upgrading, and why?

I’ve published an article on these topics here on the SIGHUP blog.
